input:
On the desk, you see a set of things arranged in a row: a pink cup, a fuchsia crayon, and a silver sheet of paper. What is the color of the left-most thing?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
